page.title: 13Industry
page.content: Most of March's{factories}are in the {Northern part of March}because the plots are away from most houses and the wind rarely blows South. { Longhill Road}has been set aside by the{Fenland District Council}for mini factories,like{Nanon}(who print sweat- shirts),{Furniture Doctor,}and{Master {Shifters. In{Marwick Road,}there are{March Cold {Stores, Guy Morton & Son Ltd.,March {Kitchens,}and{Anglia Resins. { March Concrete Products Ltd}has a large factory in{Estover Road.}Several hundred pipes are made every year, which go all around{United Kingdom. They have made canoes for the{Concrete {Canoe Races.}This year their concrete canoe won the{Construction Cup. The{London Refurbishing}and{Davern {Workwear}are in{Elliott Rd,}south of the railway. C.Kisby and V.List.
